ch.hearc.orlac.view.jpanel.tools

Class JPanelSpinner

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • ch.hearc.orlac.view.jpanel.tools.JPanelSpinner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class JPanelSpinner
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    JPanel contains a JSpinner and informations such as the name, min and max value and current value of the JSpinner.
    Author:
    chavailm
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
